news_header: A UK court sentenced Alexander McCartney to life in prison for 185 charges, including manslaughter and child sexual abuse.
news_text: Alexander McCartney, a 26-year-old from Northern Ireland, was sentenced to life in prison after being found guilty of 185 charges, including the manslaughter of 12-year-old Cimarron Thomas and multiple counts of online child sexual abuse and blackmail. McCartney posed as a teenage girl to groom and blackmail young females globally, leading to severe consequences for his victims. He admitted to charges involving 70 children but is believed to have targeted around 3,500 victims across 30 countries. The court heard that his actions were on an 'industrial scale,' and he was described as a 'disgusting child predator' by law enforcement.
